General.Name: Taiwan FamilyMart Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan FamilyMart Co., Ltd. operates and manages various convenience stores in Taiwan and internationally. It offers warehouse tally, electronic information and payment, system integrated, catering, trucking, staffing, and packaging services. The company also engages in the sales and services of computer software and related equipment; and manufacturing of food and logistics activities. In addition, it wholesales and retails books and magazines, food, and household merchandise. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Taiwan FamilyMart Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of FamilyMart Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 61, Zhongshan North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
